page.title: 18Education
page.content: There is a primary school in Willoughby to which go 68 pupils from the surrounding area.There are three classes one of which is a wooden structure that holds the youngest children taught by Mrs.Ward.The others are in two rooms of the main building which is mainly of brick;but attached to it is the hall which is made of wood.Mr.B.Dawson teaches the middle class and also music.The Headmaster is Mr.R.S.J.Saunders who has Class 3. Every day we have maths and English lessons in the morning.In the after- noon we may do R.E.,history,geography, science,art,woodwork or needlework, P.E.and games.Stories are read,too. We play football,netball,cricket, rounders,athletics and gymnastics.We only have a small playground so some of these activities are played on the village playing field.
